Hello blank fragment //guide
Welcome to PlantCare!

 1. Dashboard - View all hardware analytical data.

 2. Plantarium - View hydro plant list.

 3. PlantGuard - Check your plant disease and solution.

 4. Nutrigroww - Learn about nutrition and buy section.

 5. Chat Assist - Get assistance with your plant-related queries.

 6. About Us - Learn about me and my group details.

 Enjoy exploring PlantCare and taking care of your plants!
